title: Volume of bottled water in the U.S. 2010 to 2018
summary: Overall Sales volume in billion dollars has increased over the Year.
Sales volume in billion dollars is roughly constant from 2007 to 2008, and finally slightly increasing from 2008 to 2011.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Sales volume in billion dollars, of value 9.11 was reached at Year 2011
The lowest Sales volume in billion dollars, of value 8.45 was reported at Year 2009
min_summary: In general Sales volume in billion dollars has stayed the same over the Year.
Sales volume in billion dollars is roughly constant from 2007 to 2008, and finally slightly increasing from 2008 to 2011.
